effect.black_white: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: Gives the user’s held item to the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Gives the user’s held item to the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
